manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The package com.raelity.jvi is a port from "C" to Java of a subset of vim; this is the editing engine. com.raelity.jvi.swing is a UI built on javax.swing; it is independent of the editing engine. com.raelity.jvi.cmd brings up a JFrame containing a JEditorPane with jVi attached.

This module is the platform specific bindings that interfaces NetBeans to jVi, jvi.sourceforge.net. jVi provides vi/vim functionality for a standard Java editor UI. As well as integrating jVi into NetBeans, this module adds additional functionality to jVi by registering NetBeans specific colon commands.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: com.raelity.jvi/0 = 17, org.netbeans.modules.editor/3 > 1.41.1.3.8.2, org.netbeans.modules.editor.completion/1 > 1.13.2, org.netbeans.modules.editor.fold/1 > 1.5.22, org.netbeans.modules.editor.indent/2 > 1.5, org.netbeans.modules.editor.lib/2 > 2.2.10.2, org.netbeans.modules.editor.lib2/1 > 1.19.0.2, org.netbeans.modules.editor.mimelookup/1 > 1.3.22, org.netbeans.modules.editor.settings/1 > 1.21, org.netbeans.modules.editor.settings.storage/1 > 1.18, org.netbeans.modules.options.api/1 > 1.10.2, org.openide.awt > 6.7.22, org.openide.dialogs > 7.8, org.openide.filesystems > 7.13.1.1.1, org.openide.io > 1.9.22, org.openide.loaders > 5.9.22, org.openide.modules > 6.5.22, org.openide.nodes > 6.7.22, org.openide.text > 6.21.2, org.openide.util > 6.8.22, org.openide.util.lookup > 8.1, org.openide.windows > 6.5.22
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: jVi - vi/vim editor clone for NetBeans
